subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under 66 to take a one-stroke lead over Mark O’Meara and Mike Reid in the Outback Steakhouse Pro-Am in Lutz, Fla.
snippet: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under 66 to take a one-stroke lead over Mark O’Meara and Mike Reid in the Outback Steakhouse Pro-Am in Lutz, Fla.
